content:
Those of us who work on Catlab.jl and other AlgebraicJulia projects have started a blog:

https://www.algebraicjulia.org/blog/

We'll be writing about how to use applied category theory in scientific and technical computing. So far @James Fairbanks , @Owen Lynch, and I have each written a post. The ratio of math content to programming content will vary but the hope is to be accessible to a fairly broad STEM audience. Happy to hear your thoughts and feedback!
A feed is available at this URL. I need to add a link to the main page so people can actually find it.
